execution_plan.description: Select IDs of goods that have flavor 'chocolate'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE flavor = 'chocolate';

execution_plan.description: Count purchases per item (Item) from the items table for the goods IDs returned in step 1 and keep only those purchased at most 10 times.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Item AS id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id) GROUP BY Item HAVING COUNT(*) <= 10;
